summary: When a career criminal's plan for revenge is thwarted by unlikely circumstances, he puts his intended victim's son in his place by putting him in prison...and then joining him.
cast: Dax Shepard|Will Arnett|Chi McBride|David Koechner|Dylan Baker|Michael Shannon|Miguel Nino|Jay Whittaker|Amy Hill|David Darlow|Joseph Marcus|Nick Phalen|A.J. title: Un novato en prisión
